title: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has text with a large amount of white space
description: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has a label that is positioned in the middle of the page with a significant amount of white space around it. The vertical alignment of the label should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.
OB: The Java Source Attachment Preference Page has a label that is vertically aligned to the middle of the page, resulting in a large amount of white space around it. The label's vertical alignment should be set to SWT.ALIGN_BEGINNING.
EB: The label should be positioned at the top like the other labels on the page.
SR:
1. Load a project from the repository.
2. Select a source folder.
3. Open Properties.
4. Select Java Source Attachment.
5. [details] You will see an info label in the middle of the dialog. The label should be positioned at the top like the other labels on the page.
